page.description: Perform some action on a ViewBox control (e.g. refresh the ViewBox, etc.)

item.name: Action name
item.description: Specify the ViewBox Action that you want to execute.

item.name: ViewBox Id(s)
item.description: Specify the ViewBox(s) you want to perform an action on. You can enter a comma delimited list of ViewBoxIds if you want to refresh the data in more than one ViewBox in a single Ajax callback.
